paper_abstract: Given a Brouwerian complete lattice (L, <=) and two referential sets K and E, and using a fuzzy relation R epsilon L-ExE which is reflexive and symmetric, certain fuzzy relations (H) over cap epsilon L-KxE are characterized as solutions of X (sic) R = X, proving that they play the role of the blocks in the context of crisp tolerance relations. Moreover, it is verified that these new fuzzy blocks (H) over cap can be determinated by means of the L-fuzzy concepts associated with the K-labeled L-fuzzy context (L, K, E, E, R).
paper_title: ANALYSIS OF CERTAIN L-FUZZY RELATIONAL EQUATIONS AND THE STUDY OF ITS SOLUTIONS BY MEANS OF THE L-FUZZY CONCEPT THEORY
